topic.title: RETINOPATHY OF PREMATURITY PLUS DISEASE STATUS (RIGHT EYE)
topic.shortdesc: The status of plus disease (a significant level of vascular dilation and tortuosity observed at the posterior retinal vessels, reflecting an increase of blood flow through the retina) in the eye as determined during Retinopathy of Prematurity Screening.
